clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Sugammadex is indicated for the reversal of neuromuscular blockade induced by rocuronium bromide and vecuronium bromide in adults undergoing surgery

contraindications.disease: Patients with severe renal impairment with creatinine clearance below 30 mL min should avoid use of drug as their clearance of the drug is reduced and there is inconsistent evidence about its safety in this subset of patients

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of bleeding and hemorrhage can be increased when Lepirudin is combined with Sugammadex
